name: Al S
text: It amazes me that this place is still in business. The children- yes, children- that run this place are a mess. Orders are frequently wrong, delivery is over an hour even during not-so-busy times, the prices change every other day, and the …More

name: Denis Johnson
text: This place is so good. Great customer service and my favorite pizza without a doubt. I've had special requests and they fulfilled them perfectly.

name: Adam Scoggins
text: Went for lunch and the food and service was great. Thomas was helpful and prompt. Good lunch specials for a fair price. Would recomend to everyone.

name: Michael McCann
text: Picked up my pie around 630 and they were super busy.  The manager handled it very well.  Definitely will return

name: Elizabeth Schmidtke
text: The Shelby Twp Cottage Inn Use to be good now it's horrible. The employees that take your order don't get the order straight and who ever is making the pizza doesn't know what they're doing or just don't care. I own my own business and I …More

name: James Miller
text: I order subs from this location regularly and love them. In my experience, the food has always been great and the delivery has been fast and friendly.

name: JesusIs TheTruth
text: We ordered online and the price advertised was different from the price in the cart at checkout. When my husband got there to mention it she was quick to state they havent updated the price online yet so we were stuck paying the higher …More

name: Laura
text: I ordered 3 different toppings  and it looked and tasted like it didn't have any.  On top of that my pizza tasted raw

name: Samuiel Miok
text: I'm a long haul truck driver and have had pizza from all over the country and this is one of the best places I've been to

name: Chelsea Harrington
text: Ordered a pizza, drove 30 mins to get it, got home and it was completely wrong. Waited on hold for 13 mins to speak with a manager, guy answered and said "she told me to tell you she's busy and doesn't have time to talk to you" and then …More

name: Nick Talwar
text: Order from here all the time.  Nice people

name: Brian Hughes
text: This franchisee and the corporation are not on the same page. When I contacted this location about an issue I had with the rewards program, they had no idea what I was talking about, even though it is clearly listed on the website. Too many options around the area to deal with this, will never return.

name: Jessen Williams
text: trash..... I'd take a frozen dumpster pizza over this.
